+@name: Suppose a Kid From the Last Dungeon Boonies Moved to a Starter Town

info.+content: Suppose a Kid From the Last Dungeon Boonies Moved to a Starter Town
Tatoeba Last Dungeon Mae no Mura no Shōnen ga Joban no Machi de Kurasu Yō na Monogatari
たとえばラストダンジョン前の村の少年が序盤の街で暮らすような物語

Lloyd is a novice adventurer whose dream is to discover “true strength” in the capital he's always admired, despite growing up with neighbors who always considered him weak. He departs his hometown, which just so happens to be located right next to one of the most dangerous dungeons in the world. Lloyd may think of himself as powerless, but when he goes to the city that serves as the starter town for adventurers, the difference between him and everyone else couldn't be starker. (from manga)
"Tatoeba Sore wa Yūki no Mahō" (Suppose That is the Magic of Bravery) by Haruka Yamazaki
「たとえばラストダンジョン前の村の少年が序盤の街で暮らすような物語」TVアニメ公式サイト

title.+content: tatoeba rasutodanjon mae no mura no shōnen ga joban no machi de kurasu yōna monogatari
tatoeba hyakujū no ō ga dōbutsuen no fureai kōnā ni nekorogaru yōna bachigaikan
tatoeba " nan demo shimasu ！ " to iwarerya warui ki wa shinaikedo soko wa dame tte iwanakyaikenai yōna jirenma
tatoeba shōsetsu no shujinkō ga monogatari o daidanen ni michibīta yōna asa
tatoeba zasshi ni notteita ru kudoki monku o shinni uketeshimatta yōna daitanna sasoi ppuri
tatoeba zettai katsudarō tte yatsu ga katte , zettai makerudarō tte yatsu mo katsu yōna kōryū shiai no kaishi
tatoeba fuan ga nai wakede wa nakattaga yappari shirinugui o suru no wa jibun ni nari sōna yokan
tatoeba engi de mo koibito no furi o shiteitara honki ni nac chi yaukotomoarimasuwayonetu ！na jōkyō
tatoeba joban no danjon ni dekaketeittara rasu bosu ga 3 nin ita yōna tenkai
tatoeba " nebārando ni ichi haku ni nichi shitekuru "nami ni arienai densetsu no mura e no kikyō
tatoeba eiga no chūban no yō ni akuyaku ga chirachira suru kuraimakkusu ichi ho temae
tatoeba rasutodanjon mae no mura no shōnen ga joban no machi de kurasuto konna kaze ni naruyone tte tenkai
